content.rendered:
Dhaval is an experienced Finance and Marketing enthusiast with a demonstrated history of working in Business Development and Financial Industry. He has a MBA with specialization in Finance from U.K and Certified Financial Planner. He has acquired extensive experience of 20 years starting from traditional family run business to corporate.

Dhaval is a keen planner, strategist & implementer with demonstrated abilities in accomplishing business growth on a consistent basis. One of his key strengths is the ability to build and sustain valuable relationships over time with clients as well as team who has worked with him.

He has got proven skills in managing teams to work in sync with the corporate set parameters by motivating himself & team, for achieving business and individual goals. He also possesses key factors like team leadership, PR skills, successful planning and execution, brainstorming and project completion with time bonds and under immense pressure.
